nodes.text: The S-1 Vamblade was a type of vamblade produced by Prax Arms. It possessed a magnetic locking mechanism that retraction or extension of the weapon's blade by its users with a simple flick of their wrist. When retracted, a heavy coat, robe or similar garb concealed the vambraces which it was held in, making the weapon favored by assassins. The cost of the S-1 Vamblade was 500 credits.

The S-1 Vamblade was first mentioned in the new Star Wars canon in Gadgets and Gear, a 2019 supplement to Fantasy Flight Games' series of Star Wars Roleplaying products. The weapon was originally mentioned in the Star Wars Legends continuity in Dangerous Covenants, a 2014 supplement to the Star Wars: Edge of the Empire roleplaying series published by Fantasy Flight Games.
